Since Pointy Boy season is right around the corner I figured why not a supercross test track, So without any further delay, Welcome to Session Supercross!!!
This is a fantasy track inspired by Stone riders Honda test track he made alot time ago.
I made the SX template my self, but shout out to Logan for the SX triple face.
Thanks To
– Everyone who helped test, as this was my first try at making a supercross track in two years.
– Red Rider for letting me and everyone else use your vehicle models.
– Shady, for giving me the wall ride bored so I didnt have to figure out the correct angle.
And of course Thanks to the SessionMX team!
The programs I used
– Gimp
– Blender
– Leveler

MERRY CHRISTMAS!! I wanted to give back to the community for Christmas this year, after all of the support I have received throughout the year, not just on tracks, but my Youtube and Tik Tok as well, without you guys, none of this would be possible. THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR ALL OF YOUR SUPPORT THIS YEAR!! I would like to thank SB Suki, Red Rider, Kewin Fuela, BClay, Checkerz, Qwestshun, Reaperdoc, Earthwurx, Niko, Kellz, and King MX for all of the help that they have all provided me with along the way, as well as any assets I have used provided by them! This community at its core is amazing, so lets keep it that way, and continue to grow! thank you all so much!! I hope you enjoy this Christmas Present, and I hope to participate in some races on it with you guys here soon! Have a safe, and fun holiday!

MADE FOR SNOBIKES!!! – https://mxb-mods.com/snocross-pack-v-3-rev-doo-600rs-and-mxz-440/
Merry Christmas! Ive been wanting to do this for a while and christmas seems like a good excuse to finally bother finishing it. This is a rescaled and reskinned version of my sand dunes freeride map designed for the Snobikes. You will have to increase the gearing to allow for higher top speed than stock to clear the jumps.

https://mxb-mods.com/reix-2021-resolute-.title: Reix 2021 Resolute Enduro Indoor Extreme
https://mxb-mods.com/reix-2021-resolute-.creator: Resolute Kraken
https://mxb-mods.com/reix-2021-resolute-.description:
Description
Downloads
Welcome to
Resolute Enduro Indoor eXtreme
(REIX).  This track is a replica of the SEIX (Super Enduro Indoor eXtreme –
https://superenduroseix.com
) facility in Ocaña, Spain.  The SEIX track was designed by team Sherco rider Mario Roman.  This track was created as a beginner level Endurocross/SuperEnduro course in preparation for more advanced tracks to be released as part of a future EX series in 2022.
Just like anything, it takes some practice to do endurocross in MXB so if you don’t have the patience to learn then you probably want to keep moving past this post.  If you are having problems with slow physics – just go faster.
My tracks are mainly made for my own riding enjoyment while learning new tools and methods in Blender. This track took roughly 3 months and 300+ hours to create. Most of the time was spent on the environment models, baking shadow maps for all those objects, and the terrain masks using those shadow maps.  The heightmaps were created entirely in Blender. I’ve tried to make it as close to 1:1 scale as possible while still being rideable and fun in MXB.  A lot of experimentation and testing was done to work around the MXB physics for the EX obstacles. This was mainly done with the use of two heightmaps.
Special Thanks:
– GreenLenux for custom wall art, logos, and bike model
– iNsane for bike model and EDF conversion + information on FRM file format
– Osmeralda for log base model
– JV for water tank model
– GioPanda for base fence model and trailer tires
